mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS tenant_id, t.code AS tenant_code, t.name AS tenant_name, t.status AS status, tu.is_default AS is_default FROM tenant_users tu INNER JOIN tenants t ON t.id = tu.tenant_id WHERE tu.user_id = #{userId} AND tu.status = 1 AND t.status = 1 ORDER BY tu.is_default DESC, t.id ASC
